Name: Starazius
About the game: Jump into your starship and take on a mysterious enemy! Travel through various strange regions as you work towards the source of evil, collecting powerful upgrades and unique weapons that will help along the way. Random elements mean your journey will always be a little different, so you never quite know what to expect! FEATURES: - Explore 14 stages, each with unique obstacles, enemy patterns, and bosses - Master 3 different challenging play modes - Rogue-lite gameplay makes every run different to the last - Amass powerful upgrades which stack together for different effects - Find weapons and shop for items to help you get further - Unlock new ships to play as, each changing the game a little - Unlock new special abilities, each providing unique assistance for your journey - Unlock visual customization options by completing achievements as you play
